summary: Skyrim is kind of empty, time to fill the gaps.
descriptionHtml:
[b]ATTENTION! THIS MOD HAS BEEN ABANDONED AND WILL NO LONGER RECEIVE UPDATES!
 [/b]I have thought about this for awhile now. And I have decided to quit modding. Or at least quit doing these big projects.With everything going on in my life right now, I just cant give it the time it needs anymore. I truly thought I could complete this project, but I was wrong. I'm sorry. Welcome to NPCs for Skyrim Beta Release,  my first huge project. The aim of this mod is to make the Skyrim World a little less empty with new NPCs, factions, and opportunity for gold.

And yes, im aware of Cutting Room Floor, Inconsequential NPCs, and Interesting NPCs. Yes i use all three. Yes you should download them.

Now, to get down to brass tacks, this mod is unfinished, majorly. The beta release is meant to let modders test it and give feedback on it, and post bugs in the bug section. Here is a list of holds and the amount of NPCs in each one, planned and finished, oh and BTW It is as Immersive as you make it, if you dont like a name, well too bad, everyone is entitled to their opinion :P

_____________________
Whiterun: 4/6               |
The Pale: 0/2                |
Haafingar: 0/8              |
Winterhold: 0/5             |
Hjaalmarch: 0/4            |
The Rift: 0/9                 |
Eastmarch: 0/10            |
Falkreath: 0/3               |
The Reach: 0/8              |
Travelling NPCs: 0/4       |
Solstheim: 0/15             |
______________________

Yes. only four actors have been complete. My Defense? Im still new to voice acting and shiz...

[size=6]VOICE ACTORS
[/size]
Sepherose
Arafox
Caerulean
kvatchcount (myself)
jonthemechanic


[size=6]SPECIAL THANKS
[/size]
Sepherose - Voice Acting
Arafox - Voice Acting
Caerulean - Voice Acting
Beaumath - Showing me how to script with Papyrus
jonthemechanic - Voice Acting

[size=6]FAQ

[/size]Q: There is an NPC with no schedule set up and barely any voice, what the fuck?
A: It is an incomplete NPC and will be finished soon.

Q: Is this compatible with the Cutting Room Floor?
A: Yes, it should also be fully compatible with Interesting NPCs and Inconsequential NPCs.

Q: I got the grey face bug and/or no voice, what did i do wrong?
A: Reinstall the mod, you might have missed a file or two.

Q: You take to long to upload each update, fuck you!
A: Thanks for volunteering to be on my blocked-from-all-my-files-and-PMs list, also, i have ALOT going on my life, so updates are spread out. I think its important that im trying.

Q: I wanna be a voice actor, but how do i get in touch with you?
A: Im happy to take on new voice actors, but i wont accept everybody, just PM me and let me think it over.

Q: Change it back to Immersive NPCs!
A: No.

[size=6]HOW TO INSTALL
[/size]
Manually Download it OR us NMM
Extract all files into the Data Directory
Start up Skyrim
Its fully installed.


[size=6]HOW TO UNINSTALL

[/size]Delete all files related to this mod from the Skyrim Data Directory



[size=6]REQUIRED FILES

[/size]Dawnguard
Dragonborn
Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch (To Prevent Vanilla Bugs)




[size=6]Check Out These Mods Aswell

[/size]Cutting Room Floor by Arthmoor
Civil War Overhaul by apollodown
Interesting NPCs by kristakahasi
Inconsequential NPCs by ripple
author: kvatchcount
